name: Christmas Danger (MattsGames)
description:
Christmas Danger is a first-person shooter in which you have to go through an obstacle course and get to the finish line. But the way you will be blocked by hostile snowmen, sharp spikes and ice blocks. Use a jetpack and a shotgun to overcome obstacles. The game was made in 48 hours for a GameJam, but will be further refined and updated in the future!

Features:

1. Jetpack is the main mechanics of the game, you can use it to fly obstacles.
2. A gun is a weighty argument why you should not be attacked, use it to kill evil snowmen.
3. Gifts and cookies - find them on the map and use them to restore your lives.
4. Snowmen and Lives - your opponents are snowmen who shoot gifts at you. Gifts take your lives until you die.
5. Darkness is your opponent, following you every level, if you delay, the darkness will overtake you and destroy you.

Controls:

WASD - walking.
E - interaction.
Ctrl - sit down.
LMB - shoot.
Space - flight.
Esc - pause.
